Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • fopbot.FieldEntity
      • fopbot.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends FieldEntity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot(int x, int y)
      Creates and spawns a new robot at field (x,y) in the world Default direction: NORTH ; numberOfCoins = 0
      Robot(int x, int y, Direction direction, int numberOfCoins)
      Creates and spawns a new robot at field (x,y) in the world
      Robot(KarelWorld world, int x, int y)
      Creates and spawns a new robot at field (x,y) in the given world
      Robot(KarelWorld world, int x, int y, Direction direction, int numberOfCoins)
      Creates and spawns a new robot at field (x,y) in the given world
